name: Skelly game 2D
description:
Sorry didn't finish the skelly to put into the game. Parallax looks cool with the images in the background moving. Was a little disheartened by the loss of the https://joshua-gillespie.itch.io/the-hero-skelly project. Really bad start to the jam. I managed to scrape this together though. I achieved importing a landscape from photoshop that I made into unity and attach it to a 2D platformer controller. During this time I've been making a character to add as well, not sure if the image shows up on the page. There is a t - pose character skelly.
